field.filter: SELECT Person AS p WHERE p.org_id = :this->org_id
SELECT Person AS p JOIN lnkPersonToTeam AS l ON l.person_id=p.id JOIN Team AS t ON l.team_id=t.id WHERE t.id = :this->supervisor_group_id
SELECT Person AS p JOIN lnkPersonToTeam AS l ON l.person_id=p.id JOIN Team AS t ON l.team_id=t.id WHERE t.id = :this->manager_group_id

method.comment: /** * To be deprecated: use SetCurrentDate() instead * @return void */
/** * To be deprecated: use SetCurrentDate() instead * @return void */

dashlet.title: UI-ChangeManagementOverview-ChangeByCategory-last-7-days
dashlet.query: SELECT Change WHERE creation_date > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)

dashlet.title: UI-ChangeManagementOverview-Last-7-days
dashlet.query: SELECT Change WHERE creation_date > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)

dashlet.title: UI-ChangeManagementOverview-ChangeByDomain-last-7-days
dashlet.query: SELECT Change WHERE creation_date > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)

dashlet.title: UI-ChangeManagementOverview-ChangeByStatus-last-7-days
dashlet.query: SELECT Change WHERE creation_date > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)

menu.oql: SELECT Change WHERE agent_id = :current_contact_id AND status NOT IN ("closed", "resolved")
